title: 67 x 31 Inch Acrylic Free Standing Oval Soaker Bathtub - Glossy White (OPEN BOX)
item_description:
67 x 31 Inch Acrylic Free Standing Oval Soaker Bathtub - Glossy White (OPEN BOX)

Condition: OPEN BOX
SKU: 21A0106-67
Freestanding soaking tub, easy to clean, easy to install
with self-leveling legs and a flexible drain hose
Designed from high quality acrylic material to ensure durability

Material: Acrylic

Tub/Shower Features: Predrilled Drain Holes, Predrilled Overflow Holes, Self Leveling Base
